video_title: How To Easily Reach Your Goals @TheDiaryOfACEO
transcript:
so if I have a goal that I want to be a
millionaire and I work today and I earn
$10 how does my brain interpret that it
looks at the effort that I put in it
says $10 is nowhere near my goal and it
actually tanks my motivation because it
looks at this situation it says I have
not moved sufficiently close to my goal
so the bigger our goal is the harder it
is for our brain to get on board with
doing it so the 25% rule is take
anything that you want to accomplish and
cut it in half and then cut it in half
again and this should be your first goal
at a minimum you can even go smaller
than that you go 12.5 there's no amount
that is too small but generally speaking
if you really look at it the more
ambitious your goals are the harder they
will be to achieve
